text: Those who can make you believe absurdities can make you commit atrocities.
author: voltaire

text: It is difficult to free fools from the chains they revere.
author: voltaire

text: It's better to be a pirate than to join the navy.
author: Steven Paul "Steve" Jobs

text: Remembering that you are going to die is the best way I know to avoid the trap of thinking you have something to lose. You are already naked. There is no reason not to follow your heart.
author: Steven Paul "Steve" Jobs

text: A happy man is too satisfied with the present to dwell too much on the future.
author: Albert Einstein

text: Unthinking respect for authority is the greatest enemy of truth.
author: Albert Einstein

text: I do not carry such information in my mind since it is readily available in books. ...The value of a college education is not the learning of many facts but the training of the mind to think.
author: Albert Einstein

text: Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance you must keep moving.
author: Albert Einstein

text: Science can flourish only in an atmosphere of free speech.
author: Albert Einstein
